headline: Tech Stocks That Are Down Today: AMD, Palo Alto Networks, DataDog and Micron Technology
summary: After yesterday’s debacle in which approximately $1 trillion in market capitalization was erased from the stock market, some technology stocks are still hunting a bottom. With the Nasdaq Composite now down 3% for the month of November so far, the AI rally has lost its steam for the time being as the markets wrestle with ... Tech Stocks That Are Down Today: AMD, Palo Alto Networks, DataDog and Micron Technology

headline: 1 Cash-Producing Stock Worth Your Attention and 2 We Ignore
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
